page.title: 20CUSTOMS SPRING GALA
page.content: The Spring Gala was held in the playing field in may. William Tarmey(Jack Duckworth) who acts in Coronation Street, the twice weekly soap on Independent TV came along. There are many interesting things there like Kiddies Castles when small children jump about on an inflated castle. Tombola where people pay 10p for a piece of paper with a no. on with a possibility of winning a prize. You could try to win a goldfish, a teddy or a coconut. There is a disco dancing competition which was won by Karen from our school. She got a record token worth Â£5. There is a lucky dip where you put your hand in a box and win a prize. There is a fun run for under twelves and over twelves. The under twelves race was won by Dewi Gwynedd from Ysgol Cefn Coch.
